IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.save_character_properties') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.save_character_properties GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.save_character_properties @account_id dbo.id_t, @character_id dbo.id_t, @config VARCHAR(8000), @prefs VARCHAR(8000) AS SET NOCOUNT ON
UPDATE dbo.Character_Properties SET config = @config, prefs = @prefs WHERE character_id = @character_id IF @@ROWCOUNT = 0 BEGIN INSERT INTO dbo.Character_Properties (character_id, config, prefs) VALUES (@character_id, @config, @prefs) END
SET NOCOUNT OFF
